checkForBiospecimenParticipant

public static boolean checkForBiospecimenParticipant(int intBiospecimenID,
                                                     int intStudyKey)
checkForBiospecimenParticipant Looks up the ix_biospecimen_smartform table to check if a biospecimen is already a participant in the smartforms You must pass this the specimen KEY, not ID.
